H0.text: what nba team did derrick rose play for. New York Knicks

H1.text: what nba team did derrick rose play for. Cleveland Cavaliers

H3.text: what nba team did derrick rose play for. Chicago Bulls

A4.text: the Bulls drafted Chicago native Derrick Rose from the University of Memphis as the number 1 draft pick

A5.text: Rose earned the 2011 NBA MVP Award, thereby becoming the youngest player in NBA history to win it
